attributes.action: Bring back smoking in pubs and clubs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This about having a 50-50 area, one for the smokers and one for the non smokers. This would mean out of ten pubs/clubs five of them would be smoking and so on. Its a simple solution to a growing concern. It is every persons right to smoke or not. So this way we are giving a choice for the consumer. So if you wish to have these types of premises Please sign this e-petition. Many thanks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
